results.description:
Prints available at http://bit.ly/cesarprints

I'm releasing my series of sky gradients photography. It's a collection of 16 photos of clear sky gradients from sunrise, sunset, or during the day situations. There's also some long exposure with some drag of the ocean cases. It's a very minimal series that would be great for desktop or mobile wallpapers.
